channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - user

item.title: How logins get their SELinux user context
item.description: Sometimes, especially when users are converting their systems to be SELinux-enabled, their user context is wrong. An example would be when, after logon (in permissive mode), the user is in the system_u:system_r:local_login_t domain instead of a user domain like staff_u:staff_r:staff â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
